game.name: Bum Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Captions available, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 부랑자 시뮬레이터는 부적절한 유머와 기억에 남는 캐릭터들이 수없이 출현하는 샌드박스 게임입니다. 당신은 Bumsville의 거리에서 살고 있습니다. 여기서 적응하고, 생존하고 도시 전설이 되기 위한 준비가 되었습니까?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bum Simulator is a sandbox game bursting with inappropriate humor and memorable characters. You live on the streets of Bumsville. Do you have what it takes to adapt, survive and become an urban legend?

reviewHighlights.text: Rude, crude, and socially unacceptable. I love it!
From the reviews I was expecting this game to be just a few decent minutes of hobo jokes but holy crap I feel like I bought a ticket for Friday the 13...
